name: Life Insolvency
description:
Try to recover from a accident before your money run out.

The concept of this game was based on a real life event of a family member that is still  (04/29) undergoing treatment since 03/26.

This game was made in 5 or 7 hours of jam using the scraps of a project that the team decided to make in other engine. I planned to add more things but was very tired, maybe later.
